title: The Pinnacle Of Light
opening: At the request of King Mordred, Roy headed for the Tower of the Saint on the
The Tower of the Saint was a place of worship for Saint Elimine, one of the
Eight Heroes, and in the tower lay various holy objects relating to her.
However, this sacred tower was now under the control of Bishop Windham, who had
rebelled against the Elimine Church by Roartz's orders.

intro.speaker: Windham
intro.line: Lord Roartz fled!? Then what will happen to me, who turned against the Church?

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Sir, Lord Roartz’s message is that he ‘doesn’t want to waste time dealing with useless bishops who cannot even tame the Elimine Church.'

intro.speaker: Windham
intro.line: This is all because that damned Yoder got in my way...

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Well, yes... But even if you tell me about it...

intro.speaker: Windham
intro.line: ...All right, fine... This is our last mission. If we are to die, then the Lycia Alliance Army will be going down with us! Prepare the Heavenly Arrows!

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: B-But Bishop Windham! If we use those, they may hit our allies as well!

intro.speaker: Windham
intro.line: Quiet! I do the ordering around here! ...I shall show them...hahaha...!

intro.speaker: Douglas
intro.line: This is the Tower of the Saint. Saint Elimine’s weapon, the Aerial spell book, lies here.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Lord Douglas, thank you for helping us when we were your enemies just a while earlier.

intro.speaker: Douglas
intro.line: You do not have to thank me. The king ordered me to help you. Do not worry about it.

intro.speaker: Douglas
intro.line: Besides, you are the saviors of Etruria. It is an honor to be able to fight along your side.

boss.speaker: Windham
boss.line: Die! All of you! Everything shall be destroyed!

end.speaker: Soldier
end.line: Master Roy, I think we have found the spell book.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Lord Douglas, is this...?

end.speaker: Douglas
end.line: Yes, this is it. This is the Pinnacle of Light, the Aerial spell book, Saint Elimine’s weapon.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: May we use it?

end.speaker: Douglas
end.line: The king told you to use anything in the tower that you might find useful. And the Elimine Church is on our side as well. If we still have trouble, then I can negotiate with them.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: All right. Thank you, Lord Douglas.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Princess Guinevere, I must speak with you.

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: ...Is it that we must attack Bern as well after Etruria?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: ! Did someone inform you?

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: No. ...But I knew that it would happen eventually.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: ...We cannot leave Bern running around freely any longer. I know that it will be hard to see your nation invaded, but...

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: ...Roy, I will give this to you.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: What is this?

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: It is Bern’s greatest treasure...the Fire Emblem.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: What!?

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: In the south of Bern lies a temple called the Temple of Seals. In it lies the sword that our founder, Hartmut, used.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Is it...one of the Divine Weapons?

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: I believe so. It was a sword made to slay the Dark Dragon, the leader of the Dragons during the Scouring. However, it held power so immense that it was sealed away after the war. The Fire Emblem is the key to break its seal.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: The key...

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: My brother...is trying to force the world into submission through power. That is not forgivable, no matter what the reason.

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: To stop him, all we can do is defeat the Dragon at his side.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Princess Guinevere...

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: ...My name shall be stained in history, as the woman who betrayed her nation.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: No...

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: I shall be hated all my life as a traitor. Roy, promise me one thing. When we invade Bern, promise me that you will not harm the civilians...

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: I promise. Please trust me.

end.speaker: Guinevere
end.line: ...Thank you.
